item.title: Magic Moving Mansion Mania
item.description: Overview Anastasia is lost in a magical mansion where the rooms move in mysterious ways. Help guide her to safety, but donâ€™t let her fall into nothingness! Magic Moving Mansion Mania is a mobile action-puzzle-platformer for iOS and Android. It was conceptualised and created in four months under the Game Design Initiative at Cornell (GDIAC). Role I was the Design Lead in a team of six: two designers and four programmers.
